commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All righty, practice time! Another day, another 110-percent effort! Wait, what are you guys doing?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We're looking through this.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's the notebook I've been using to keep track of you guys' practice...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup. The club hasn't even been around for that long, but looking through this sure does take me back.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You've been keeping really detailed notes on us, huh?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Not only have you written what was covered in our lessons each day, but you have also been analyzing all of our traits, strengths, and weaknesses. You are incredible.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Every page is chock-full of notes.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You might know me better than I know myself.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You've been so observant of us.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: You even made note of every time we made your heart skip a beat or get emotional. Seeing it all written out like this is a bit embarrassing, actually.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So I suppose this means you're a big fan of mine then, huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hahaha, you know I am!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Really?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But not just of you. I'm a huge fan of everyone in the club.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Man, did you have to say it? This sucks.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But what made you guys want to look through my practice notes all of a sudden? Are you guys upset with the practice regimen I've come up with?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's not it at all! It's just that there are so many notes here, ever since the day the club was founded. So we just thought maybe we could use them as a reference...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I know she's super sharp, but you can't expect her to understand if you can't get to the point.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Uh, so... What are you using them as a reference for?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I can't stop thinking of how Aqours looked while dancing in Numazu this weekend. It's simply burned into my mind.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The fact that μ's was so determined to catch up with Aqours left a deep impression on me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: They were so amazing, even μ's was feelin' a bit left behind.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Compared to them, we're total nobodies.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Aqours and μ's might be amazing, but all of you have individual traits that stand up to theirs. You guys are just gonna keep growing more and more from here on.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, I know. All we can do is make whatever progress we can each day, right?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: There's no way we can expect to just suddenly level up.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah. It wouldn't be fair to Aqours and μ's if we got to where they are without too much struggle.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's normal to want to reach the same heights though. You shouldn't ever lose sight of that feeling. Right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I've always felt like I wanted to better myself, but it was more like a dream than anything else. Something that wasn't really tangible.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But now that I have had the chance to work with you all and see everyone's efforts up close, I realized that we just have to work hard to get to that level.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So then, we all started wondering what draws people to us so we decided to check out your notebook!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We figured that we might be able to get an objective view of our appeal if we perused the notes you write about us every day.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But when we actually flipped it open, we were shocked by all of the words crammed into each page.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The love is intense.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah. We're so lucky to have you always thinking of us like this.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Thank you for always looking after us, supporting us, and cheering us on more than anybody else out there.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: And sorry for all the trouble we cause you too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: C-C'mon guys, where's all this coming from? It's really not that big of a deal.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If you love something, you want to see it succeed. That's just common sense. I'm cheering you guys on because I want to. I don't think of it as trouble at all.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We really are blessed to have you around.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: This club probably wouldn't even exist if it weren't for you... Rina-chan Board says, "Terrifying!"

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Thanks for protecting the club and bringing us all together.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I just said, you don't need to thank me... You're making me blush.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hold up, everyone! You know I'M the one who protected this club, right?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Chuckle* You did stay back to man the fort for us. Thank you!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: No need to remind us a thousandth time.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: And now we have permission to keep practicing too!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I guess good things really DO come in small packages. Isn't that right, Kasukasu?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: My name's not Kasukasu! And I'm not little!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Giggle* Isn't this great?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: After we went to Numazu, we were able to reaffirm what we needed to work towards for the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Exactly. We're gonna put together a performance worthy of sharing the stage with μ's and Aqours. That's our new goal!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: So we are counting on your continued support!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You don't have to tell me twice! So now, today, and every day forward, let's work our butts off and make everyone's dreams come true!
